metadata.title: Dualyss | Dual-Use Technologies for European Security
metadata.description: Protecting democracy with dual deterrence technologies. Dualyss develops enabling capabilities in defense, cybersecurity, and biosecurity for European strategic autonomy.

hero.title: Protecting Democracy Through Technological Preparedness
hero.subtitle: We develop enabling capabilities in defense, cybersecurity, and biosecurity to strengthen European strategic autonomy.

capabilities.subtitle: Enabling technologies for a more secure and autonomous Europe

meta.title: About Dualyss | European Dual-Use Technology Leader
meta.description: Learn about Dualyss, a Catalan Economic Interest Grouping specializing in dual-use technologies for defense, cybersecurity, and biosecurity.

about.title: About Dualyss
about.subtitle: Building European strategic autonomy through enabling capabilities

mission.title: Our Mission
mission.text: We articulate Catalonia's technological ecosystem to develop enabling capabilities, giving them scale and positioning them in European programs and debates.

vision.title: Our Vision
vision.text: A more secure, more autonomous, and better-prepared Europe—built on a solid, integrated, and innovative industrial and technological base.

values.title: Our Values
values.deterrenceDesc: Security through technological superiority and preparedness
values.autonomyDesc: Developing sovereign capabilities to reduce dependencies
values.collaborationDesc: Integrating SMEs, research centers, and industrial partners

european.title: European Commitment
european.text: As a European-focused organization, we are committed to strengthening the continent's technological sovereignty and industrial base. We actively participate in EU defense and security programs, contributing to a more resilient and autonomous Europe.

links.teamDesc: Discover the experts driving our mission forward.
links.partnersDesc: Explore our ecosystem of industrial and academic partners.

capabilities.title: Our Capabilities
capabilities.subtitle: Enabling technologies for a more secure and autonomous Europe

approach.text: We follow a systematic approach to developing and delivering enabling capabilities.

step1.title: Identify
step1.text: Assess needs and identify technological gaps

step2.title: Develop

cta.title: Ready to Explore Our Capabilities?

meta.title: Defense Technologies | Dualyss
meta.description: Discover Dualyss's defense capabilities including unmanned systems, sensors, and autonomous platforms.

defense.title: Defense Technologies
defense.subtitle: Advanced systems for modern defense requirements

overview.title: Defense Capabilities Overview
overview.text1: Our defense technology portfolio encompasses cutting-edge unmanned systems, advanced sensors, and autonomous platforms designed to meet the evolving needs of modern armed forces.
overview.text2: We work closely with defense institutions and industrial partners to develop solutions that enhance operational capabilities while ensuring interoperability with allied systems.

uav.title: Unmanned Aerial Vehicles
uav.description: Advanced drone systems for reconnaissance, surveillance, and tactical operations.

comms.title: Secure Communications
comms.description: Encrypted communication systems for battlefield coordination.

sensors.title: Advanced Sensors
sensors.description: Multi-spectral sensing and target acquisition systems.

surveillance.title: Surveillance Systems
surveillance.description: Integrated surveillance networks for situational awareness.

autonomous.title: Autonomous Systems
autonomous.description: AI-enabled autonomous platforms for various defense applications.

protection.title: Force Protection
protection.description: Systems for personnel and asset protection in hostile environments.

case1.title: Border Surveillance
case1.description: Integrated sensor networks for continuous border monitoring.

case2.title: Search and Rescue
case2.description: UAV-assisted search operations in difficult terrain.

cta.title: Interested in Defense Solutions?
cta.text: Contact us to discuss your defense technology requirements.

meta.title: Cybersecurity Solutions | Dualyss
meta.description: Comprehensive cybersecurity solutions for critical infrastructure protection and digital resilience.

overview.title: Cybersecurity Capabilities
overview.text1: In an increasingly connected world, protecting digital infrastructure is paramount. Our cybersecurity solutions address the full spectrum of threats facing modern organizations and nations.
overview.text2: We combine technical expertise with deep understanding of regulatory requirements to deliver comprehensive security solutions.

protection.title: Threat Protection
protection.description: Advanced threat detection and prevention systems.

infrastructure.title: Infrastructure Security
infrastructure.description: Securing critical infrastructure and operational technology.

network.title: Network Security
network.description: Comprehensive network monitoring and defense solutions.

crypto.title: Cryptographic Solutions
crypto.description: Advanced encryption and key management systems.

threat.title: Threat Intelligence
threat.description: Real-time threat intelligence and analysis services.

compliance.title: Compliance & Governance
compliance.description: Regulatory compliance and security governance support.

standards.title: Standards & Compliance
standards.text: Our solutions are designed to meet the highest international security standards and regulatory requirements.

cta.title: Strengthen Your Cyber Defenses
cta.text: Contact us to assess your cybersecurity posture and requirements.

meta.title: Biosecurity Capabilities | Dualyss
meta.description: Bio-sanitary response capabilities and health security solutions for emerging biological threats.

biosecurity.title: Biosecurity
biosecurity.subtitle: Health security solutions for emerging threats

overview.title: Biosecurity Capabilities
overview.text1: Our biosecurity portfolio addresses the growing need for preparedness against biological threats, from natural pandemics to deliberate biological incidents.
overview.text2: We develop integrated solutions that combine detection, response, and protection capabilities to safeguard public health and national security.

detection.title: Threat Detection
detection.description: Early warning systems for biological agent detection.

response.title: Rapid Response
response.description: Coordinated response capabilities for biological incidents.

medical.title: Medical Countermeasures
medical.description: Development and stockpiling of medical countermeasures.

protection.title: Personal Protection
protection.description: Advanced protective equipment and decontamination systems.

applications.title: Applications
applications.text: Our biosecurity solutions serve both civilian public health needs and defense requirements, ensuring comprehensive protection against biological threats.

cta.title: Enhance Your Biosecurity Preparedness
cta.text: Contact us to discuss biosecurity solutions for your organization.

meta.title: Dual-Use Technologies | Dualyss
meta.description: Technologies with both civil and defense applications, driving innovation while ensuring strategic preparedness.

dualUse.title: Dual-Use Technologies
dualUse.subtitle: Innovation for both civil and defense applications

overview.title: The Dual-Use Advantage
overview.text1: Dual-use technologies represent the intersection of civil innovation and defense capability. By developing technologies with applications in both domains, we maximize value and accelerate innovation.
overview.text2: This approach allows us to leverage commercial advancements for defense applications while ensuring civil society benefits from security-driven innovations.

concept.title: Understanding Dual-Use
concept.text: Dual-use technologies serve legitimate purposes in both civilian and defense contexts, creating synergies that benefit society as a whole.

firefighting.title: Firefighting Support
firefighting.description: UAV systems for fire detection, monitoring, and coordination of firefighting efforts.

rescue.title: Search and Rescue
rescue.description: Advanced sensors and autonomous systems for locating missing persons in difficult terrain.

maritime.title: Maritime Safety
maritime.description: Surveillance systems for maritime safety and environmental protection.

infrastructure.title: Critical Infrastructure
infrastructure.description: Monitoring and protection systems for essential infrastructure.

cta.title: Explore Dual-Use Opportunities
cta.text: Contact us to discover how dual-use technologies can benefit your organization.

meta.title: Sectors We Serve | Dualyss
meta.description: Dualyss serves institutional, industrial, academic, and public sectors across Europe.

institutional.title: Institutional Sector
institutional.description: Supporting European and national institutions in defense and security programs.

industrial.title: Industrial Sector
industrial.description: Partnering with defense contractors and technology companies.

academic.title: Academic Sector
academic.description: Collaborating with universities and research institutions.

public.title: Public Sector
public.description: Serving public safety and civil protection agencies.

european.title: European Focus
european.text: We are committed to strengthening European technological sovereignty and contributing to the EU's strategic autonomy in defense and security technologies.

cta.title: How Can We Help Your Sector?
cta.text: Contact us to discuss sector-specific solutions and partnerships.

meta.title: Privacy Policy | Dualyss
meta.description: Dualyss privacy policy explaining how we collect, use, and protect your personal information.

introduction.title: Introduction
introduction.content: Dualyss AIE ("we", "our", or "us") is committed to protecting your privacy. This Privacy Policy explains how we collect, use, disclose, and safeguard your information when you visit our website.

dataCollection.title: Information We Collect
dataCollection.content: We collect information that you voluntarily provide to us when you contact us through our website, including your name, email address, organization, and any other information you choose to provide in your message.

dataUse.title: How We Use Your Information
dataUse.content: We use the information we collect to respond to your inquiries, provide you with information about our services, and improve our website and services.

dataSharing.title: Information Sharing
dataSharing.content: We do not sell, trade, or otherwise transfer your personal information to third parties without your consent, except as required by law or to service providers who assist us in operating our website.

dataSecurity.title: Data Security
dataSecurity.content: We implement appropriate technical and organizational measures to protect your personal information against unauthorized access, alteration, disclosure, or destruction.

yourRights.title: Your Rights
yourRights.content: Under GDPR, you have the right to access, rectify, erase, restrict processing, and port your personal data. You also have the right to object to processing and to withdraw consent at any time.

cookies.title: Cookies
cookies.content: Our website uses cookies to enhance your experience. Please refer to our Cookie Policy for more information about how we use cookies.

changes.title: Changes to This Policy
changes.content: We may update this Privacy Policy from time to time. We will notify you of any changes by posting the new Privacy Policy on this page.

contact.title: Contact Us
contact.content: If you have any questions about this Privacy Policy, please contact us at privacy@dualyss.eu.

meta.title: Terms of Use | Dualyss
meta.description: Terms and conditions for using the Dualyss website and services.

acceptance.title: Acceptance of Terms
acceptance.content: By accessing and using this website, you accept and agree to be bound by these Terms of Use. If you do not agree to these terms, please do not use this website.

use.title: Use of Website
use.content: This website is provided for informational purposes about Dualyss and its services. You may use this website only for lawful purposes and in accordance with these Terms.

intellectualProperty.title: Intellectual Property
intellectualProperty.content: All content on this website, including text, graphics, logos, and images, is the property of Dualyss or its content suppliers and is protected by intellectual property laws.

userConduct.title: User Conduct
userConduct.content: You agree not to use this website in any way that could damage, disable, or impair the website, or interfere with any other party's use of the website.

disclaimers.title: Disclaimers
disclaimers.content: This website and its content are provided "as is" without warranties of any kind, either express or implied. Dualyss does not warrant that the website will be uninterrupted or error-free.

limitation.title: Limitation of Liability
limitation.content: Dualyss shall not be liable for any indirect, incidental, special, consequential, or punitive damages arising from your use of this website.

governingLaw.title: Governing Law
governingLaw.content: These Terms shall be governed by and construed in accordance with the laws of Spain and the European Union. Any disputes shall be subject to the exclusive jurisdiction of the courts of Barcelona.

changes.title: Changes to Terms
changes.content: We reserve the right to modify these Terms at any time. Changes will be effective immediately upon posting to the website.

contact.title: Contact
contact.content: For questions about these Terms, please contact us at legal@dualyss.eu.

meta.title: Cookie Policy | Dualyss
meta.description: Information about how Dualyss uses cookies on its website.

whatAreCookies.title: What Are Cookies?
whatAreCookies.content: Cookies are small text files that are placed on your device when you visit a website. They are widely used to make websites work more efficiently and to provide information to website owners.

howWeUse.title: How We Use Cookies
howWeUse.content: We use cookies to understand how you interact with our website, to remember your preferences, and to improve your overall experience on our site.

types.title: Types of Cookies We Use
types.content:
Essential Cookies: Required for the website to function properly.
Analytics Cookies: Help us understand how visitors interact with our website.
Preference Cookies: Remember your settings and preferences.

thirdParty.title: Third-Party Cookies
thirdParty.content: We may use third-party services that place cookies on your device. These services help us analyze website traffic and improve our services.

manage.title: Managing Cookies
manage.content: You can control and manage cookies through your browser settings. Please note that removing or blocking cookies may impact your experience on our website.

contact.title: Contact Us
contact.content: If you have questions about our use of cookies, please contact us at privacy@dualyss.eu.
